title: Card Filter: Curse Fix
description:
Fixes crash in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1645339812]Card Filter[/url] (by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/mrdelish/myworkshopfiles/?appid=646570]mrdelish[/url]) when curses are filtered and random curses are generated.

This mod should be loaded alongside Card Filter. It can be loaded in any order.

GitHub: https://github.com/dvide/StS-CardFilterMod-CurseFix
